attributes.action: Hold the Syrian and Russian government to account for chemical attack
attributes.additional_details: With the Trump administration cutting back on foreign aid, the people of Syria need our help. Too many lives have been lost, we are fed up of sitting back, feeling helpless about the situation. Silence is not an option, we need the UK government to protest this human rights violation and crime against humanity, peacefully. Russia, the Syrian government and America are killing people right under our noses and silence is not an option. Your religion or ideology is irrelevant. Do the right thing.
attributes.background: The war in Syria has been ongoing for 6 years, and hundreds of thousands of innocents have been murdered. The mass slaughter of civilians must be halted immediately.

rejection.details:
You could start a new petition asking the UK Government or Parliament to take some specific action in relation to the conflict in Syria. 
Alternatively you might want to consider supporting existing petitions on this issue, such as https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169466 or https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/194421
